description:
BibleZ Pro is an easy to use and full-featured Bible App for your webOS device. The aim of BibleZ Pro is to offer you a great bible reading expericene. The following features are included:

- many bible modules in different languages
- english & german commentaries
- over 15.000 cross-references
- section headings
- add study notes, bookmarks and highlights to a verse
- parallel view - read two modules at once
- full-text search
- backup & restore your notes, bookmarks and highlights
- copy & share your favourite verses with your friends
- many more

Enjoy reading your bible the webOS way!

If you have any problems or questions - send an eMail: info@zefanjas.de
